net.cnri.repository.util

Class RepositoryJsonSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cnri.repository.util.RepositoryJsonSerializer

  • public class RepositoryJsonSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for working with JSON representations of digital objects. This class contains static methods for serializing and deserializing between digital objects and JSON. Methods can work with JSON as String instances, or streaming with instances of Gson JsonWriter and JsonReader. Serialization can be configured to only include data from select elements.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DATA_NOT_PRESENT
      internal.data_not_present, the name of an attribute set on data elements where the data is not serializaed.

      • writeJson

        public static void writeJson(com.google.gson.stream.JsonWriter jsonWriter,
                             DigitalObject dobj,
                             java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> elementsToInclude)
                      throws RepositoryException,
                             java.io.IOException
        Writes a JSON representation of the given digital object. If elementsToInclude is not null, then only the named elements will include data; other elements will have attribute internal.data_not_present set to 1 in the JSON output.
        Parameters:
        jsonWriter - the JsonWriter for the JSON output
        dobj - the object to serialize
        elementsToInclude - a collection of data element names for which data should be included; if null, all data elements will include data.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException
        java.io.IOException

      • writeJson

        public static void writeJson(com.google.gson.stream.JsonWriter jsonWriter,
                             DigitalObject dobj)
                      throws RepositoryException,
                             java.io.IOException
        Writes a JSON representation of the given digital object. All data elements will include data.
        Parameters:
        jsonWriter - the JsonWriter for the JSON output
        dobj - the object to serialize
        Throws:
        RepositoryException
        java.io.IOException

      • toJson

        public static java.lang.String toJson(DigitalObject dobj,
                                      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> elementsToInclude)
                               throws RepositoryException
        Writes a JSON representation of the given digital object. If elementsToInclude is not null, then only the named elements will include data; other elements will have attribute internal.data_not_present set to 1 in the JSON output.
        Parameters:
        dobj - the object to serialize
        elementsToInclude - a collection of data element names for which data should be included; if null, all data elements will include data.
        Returns:
        the JSON output as a String
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • writeJson

        public static void writeJson(com.google.gson.stream.JsonWriter jsonWriter,
                             java.util.Collection<DigitalObject> dobjs,
                             java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> elementsToInclude)
                      throws RepositoryException,
                             java.io.IOException
        Writes a JSON representation which is an array of the representations of the digital objects in the given collection. If elementsToInclude is not null, then only the named elements will include data; other elements will have attribute internal.data_not_present set to 1 in the JSON output.
        Parameters:
        jsonWriter - the JsonWriter for the JSON output (a JSON array)
        dobjs - the objects to serialize
        elementsToInclude - a collection of data element names for which data should be included; if null, all data elements will include data.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException
        java.io.IOException

      • toJson

        public static java.lang.String toJson(java.util.Collection<DigitalObject> dobjs,
                                      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> elementsToInclude)
                               throws RepositoryException
        Writes a JSON representation which is an array of the representations of the digital objects in the given collection. If elementsToInclude is not null, then only the named elements will include data; other elements will have attribute internal.data_not_present set to 1 in the JSON output.
        Parameters:
        dobjs - the objects to serialize
        elementsToInclude - a collection of data element names for which data should be included; if null, all data elements will include data.
        Returns:
        the JSON output (a JSON array) as a String
        Throws:
        RepositoryException
